text: Carlos Xavier Rabascall Salazar (born September 3, 1960) is an Ecuadorian journalist, commercial engineer, businessman, and political consultant who is running for President of Ecuador in the 2025 general election. Before, he ran for vice president in the 2021 general election. He was born in Guayaquil, Ecuador. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian journalists Category:Ecuadorian engineers Category:Businesspeople from Guayaquil Category:Politicians from Guayaquil Category:Writers from Guayaquil
title: Carlos Rabascall
